price: 71. Y dicen: “¿Cuándo llegará (el castigo) que prometen, si son veraces?”.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
